version_description:
We have launched a dedicated website due to the brilliant response. Thank you for letting us know how we can make Pray Watch better, we really appreciate the feedback and support.

== Updates ==
- Added current location name on prayer screen
- Added option to display prayer names or abbreviations
- Added specific adhan for fajr
- Added sleep/snooze instructions in tutorial
- Added version number to about screen
- Fixed handling if location services is disabled
- Fixed date/timezone bug that effected some far east locations
- Fixed hijri date offset not applying to Apple Watch glance screen

Pray Watch never prompts you for a review. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel generous and have a couple of minutes, please leave a review, or contact us for suggestions. It makes a huge difference to us. Jazak'Allah Khair!

We have launched a dedicated website due to the brilliant response. Thank you for letting us know how we can make Pray Watch better, we really appreciate the feedback and support.

== Updates ==
- Added current location name on prayer screen
- Added option to display prayer names or abbreviations
- Added specific adhan for fajr
- Added sleep/snooze instructions in tutorial
- Added version number to about screen
- Fixed handling if location services is disabled
- Fixed date/timezone bug that effected some far east locations
- Fixed hijri date offset not applying to Apple Watch glance screen

Pray Watch never prompts you for a review. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel generous and have a couple of minutes, please leave a review, or contact us for suggestions. It makes a huge difference to us. Jazak'Allah Khair!

Note about upgrading: There is an open issue where there are duplicate prayer time notifications being fired. This is due to old and new notification structures overlapping and will flush itself out after a week. However, an update has been submitted that will explicitly clear this up. Jazak'Allah Khair for you patience and understanding.

== Updates ==
- Added iOS 9 & watchOS 2 support
- Added iPad support
- Added Apple Watch face complication!! :-)
- Added nearby masjid locator to iPhone app
- Added live timer on Today Widget
- Added UIOF prayer calculation method
- Added prayer time adjustments option
- Added pre-adhan reminder option
- Added pre-fajr alert option (Qiyam)
- Added more prayer sounds
- Added home screen shortcut (3D Force Touch)
- Added progress indicator color to red when next prayer approaching close
- Added iOS settings shortcut in "more" tab
- Added more friendly app permission request (Periscope-style)
- Removed sleep feature in favor of using only snooze
- Improved prayer times accuracy
- Made prayer progress go in reverse (approaching zero)
- Fix update prayer times when traveling across time zones
- Fix when timer finished at zero to auto update with next prayer info
- Fix Today Widget alignment on iPhone 6 Plus and other device sizes
- Fix prayer time notifications scheduling in background even if the app has not been opened for awhile
- Fix tons of other bugs and improvements

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review or contact us for suggestions. It makes a huge difference. Jazak'Allah Khair!

Note about upgrading: There is an open issue where there are duplicate prayer time notifications being fired. This is due to old and new notification structures overlapping and will flush itself out after a week. However, an update has been submitted that will explicitly clear this up. Jazak'Allah Khair for you patience and understanding.

- Added nearby masjid locator to iPhone app

- Added more prayer sounds
- Added home screen shortcut (3D Force Touch)

- Added more friendly app permission request (Periscope-style)
- Removed sleep feature in favor of using only snooze

- Fix Today Widget alignment on iPhone 6 Plus and other device sizes
- Fix prayer time notifications scheduling in background even if the app has not been opened for awhile
- Fix tons of other bugs and improvements

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review or contact us for suggestions. It makes a huge difference. Jazak'Allah Khair!

== Updates ==
- Added iOS 9 + watchOS 2 support
- Added iPad support
- Added Apple Watch face complication!! :-]
- Added nearby masjid locator in iPhone app
- Added live timer on Today Widget
- Added UIOF prayer calculation method

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review. Contact us for suggestions or to join our beta program. Jazak'Allah Khair!

== Updates ==
- Added travel mode option to update notifications while traveling without needing to opening app (*beta*)
- Added monthly prayer table for Ramadan
- Added imsak and midnight to prayer times for Ramadan
- Added time+timer watch complication
- Added more watch complication options, such as displaying imsak, fajr, and midnight
- Added dynamic 3D force touch shortcuts
- Fix clear badge on upgrades
- Fix 24hr format for utility watch complication
- Fixed masjid locator for countries banning Google maps (China and Russia)
- Moved Qibla calibration to tab instead of app load
- Moved Apple Watch settings to watchOS app

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review. Contact us for suggestions or to join our beta program. Jazak'Allah Khair!

== Updates ==
- Added Qibla to 3D Touch home shortcut
- Added custom calculation option for prayer times
- Fixed Union of Islamic Organizations of France prayer setting
- Fixes to Travel Mode (beta)
- Many other fixes and enhancements under the hood

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review. Contact us for suggestions or to join our beta program. Jazak'Allah Khair!

== Updates ==
- Added Qibla to 3D Touch home shortcut
- Added custom calculation option for prayer times
- Fixed Union of Islamic Organizations of France prayer setting
- Fixes to Travel Mode (beta)
- Many other fixes and enhancements under the hood

== What's New ==
- Added nearest masjid to 3D Touch home shortcut
- Added hijri date to Today widget
- Fixed recalibration notifications triggering unnecessarily
- Fixed watch complications resetting to defaults
- Fixed timer setting for utilitarian watch complication
- Moved watch settings and nearest masjid to context menu
- Many other fixes and enhancements under the hood

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review. Contact us for suggestions or to join our beta program. Jazak'Allah Khair!

== What's New ==
- Added nearest masjid to 3D Touch home shortcut
- Added hijri date to Today widget
- Fixed recalibration notifications triggering unnecessarily
- Fixed watch complications resetting to defaults
- Fixed timer setting for utilitarian watch complication
- Moved watch settings and nearest masjid to context menu
- Many other fixes and enhancements under the hood

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We value your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review. Contact us for suggestions or to join our beta program. Jazak'Allah Khair!

== What's New ==
- iOS 10 compatibility
- Added Home 3D Touch widget
- Added Notification 3D Touch widget
- Added Qibla compass to Today, Home, and Notification widgets
- Added iPad Split Screen and Slide Over support
- Added Apple Maps or Google Maps app support for nearest masjid
- Added multiple adhan sounds
- Added Moonsighting Committee prayer calculation
- Added Apple Watch complication icons
- Added map to choose manual location if needed
- Added self-documenting help text in settings
- Added Arabic support
- Fixed app icon badge getting stuck
- Fix cluttered Today widget
- Fix forcing user to keep opening the app
- Fixed prayer time accuracy in many scenarios
- Many other fixes and enhancements under the hood

Pray Watch never prompts you for reviews or annoy you with ads. We respect your prayers too much to interrupt. If you feel like you want to support the cause, please leave a review. Contact us for suggestions or to join our beta program. Jazak'Allah Khair!
